name: svelte-reactive-preprocessor
description: Wrap svelte reactive statements with custom events to allow devtools to detect them

scripts.test: npm run install-deps && npm run test:mocha && start-server-and-test start-server http://localhost:8888 test:cypress
scripts.patch: npm run test && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.minor: npm run test && npm version minor && npm publish && git push

author: unlocomqx
